title: Whispers of Gloom
story: The persistent overcast sky casts the castle in a muted, dreamlike gloom, making familiar paths feel new and ancient whispers stir.
effect: During this Day phase, the first time each hero enters a new room (one they have not entered this turn), they may immediately gain 1 Willpower or 1 Sanity (player's choice). However, each time a hero gains a resource this way, a random Vampire Sister (Mary, Sade, or Luci) immediately moves 3 steps directly towards that hero's room, drawn by the psychic ripples of disturbed serenity.
